title1: Your consultation with the best experts in the agricultural field
title2: Display your crops, sell and buy from your farm
title3: Providing modern agricultural equipment and all Your needs for agricultural supplies

description1:
The Agricultural Consulting Department at Hasad represents a specialized and reliable center for our farmers and those interested in agriculture, and provides them with immediate support and guidance through a team
From experts and professional agricultural consultants.
description2: The crop display section in Hasad, which is considered a wonderful interface for browsing agricultural products with ease. The section provides a unique opportunity for users to review and learn about a group of local crops and high-quality agricultural products.
description3: Hasad provides an exceptional opportunity for farmers and workers in the agricultural sector to access a wide range of high-quality tractor spare equipment and agricultural tools.
description4: Hasad provides you with a unique opportunity to explore a range of fresh crops and high-quality agricultural products, directly from trusted farms.
